DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of long term treatment of SPP100 in patients with essential hypertension. (Trial is not recruiting in the US)
DOC.brief_title: A Long Term Study of SPP100 in Patients With Essential Hypertension (Trial is Not Recruiting in the US)
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed as essential hypertension Patients with secondary hypertension or suspected of having secondary hypertension. Patients suspected of having malignant hypertension Patients with any serious diseases or symptoms
